DOC.detailed_description: Hong Kong highly urbanized city many people work long hour daily week , especially middle-aged adult . The limited time lack professional exercise instruction always barrier participate physical activity ( PA ) . With advance information technology ( IT ) , knowledge PA rapidly disseminate Internet smartphone . We design IT- instruction base lifestyle intervention program , purpose improve PA level health status sample middle-aged Hong Kong adult . A two-arm parallel individual level randomize control trial ( RCT ) name `` Follow Your Virtual Trainer ( FYVT ) '' conduct among 200 healthy sedentary Chinese adult age 40 65 year . The participant randomly allocate intervention group control group . Those intervention group instruction web-based computer software term `` Virtual Trainer '' , interact smartphone apps , conduct 3-month self-planned PA training program . A serious online video seminar healthy lifestyle theme release participant biweekly among 3 month . After , 6 month observation follow . Those control group receive write advice standard PA recommendation , textual content seminar . The assessment implement baseline , 3 , 6 , 9 month . Primary outcome PA measure accelerometer International Physical Activity Questionnaire ; second outcome include cardio-respiratory fitness , rest energy expenditure , anthropometrics , body composition , blood pressure , health-related quality life , sleep quality quantity , fatigue , behavior mediator , maintenance PA .
